title: SVIMS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Medical Superintendent and Other Posts
description: Sri Venkateswara Institute of Medical Sciences (SVIMS) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Medical Superintendent, Principal, Registrar Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post Graduation, Any Degree, Degree, MD can grab this chance and apply for the SVIMS Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interestd and eligible candi...
